-- DaoM_Workflow_D2_Select -- 2014/7/18 日立 太郎 SELECT [Id], [SubSystemId], [WorkflowName], [WfPositionId], [WorkflowNo], [FromUserId], [ActionType], [ToUserId], [ToUserPositionTitlesId], [NextWfPositionId], [NextWorkflowNo], [CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow], [MailTemplateId], [ReserveArea] FROM [M_Workflow]
WHERE AND [Id] = @IdAND [Id] IS NULL AND [Id] LIKE @Id_Like AND [SubSystemId] = @SubSystemIdAND [SubSystemId] IS NULL AND [SubSystemId] LIKE @SubSystemId_Like AND [WorkflowName] = @WorkflowNameAND [WorkflowName] IS NULL AND [WorkflowName] LIKE @WorkflowName_Like AND [WfPositionId] = @WfPositionIdAND [WfPositionId] IS NULL AND [WfPositionId] LIKE @WfPositionId_Like AND [WorkflowNo] = @WorkflowNoAND [WorkflowNo] IS NULL AND [WorkflowNo] LIKE @WorkflowNo_Like AND [FromUserId] = @FromUserIdAND [FromUserId] IS NULL AND [FromUserId] LIKE @FromUserId_Like AND [ActionType] = @ActionTypeAND [ActionType] IS NULL AND [ActionType] LIKE @ActionType_Like AND [ToUserId] = @ToUserIdAND [ToUserId] IS NULL AND [ToUserId] LIKE @ToUserId_Like AND [ToUserPositionTitlesId] = @ToUserPositionTitlesIdAND [ToUserPositionTitlesId] IS NULL AND [ToUserPositionTitlesId] LIKE @ToUserPositionTitlesId_Like AND [NextWfPositionId] = @NextWfPositionIdAND [NextWfPositionId] IS NULL AND [NextWfPositionId] LIKE @NextWfPositionId_Like AND [NextWorkflowNo] = @NextWorkflowNoAND [NextWorkflowNo] IS NULL AND [NextWorkflowNo] LIKE @NextWorkflowNo_Like AND [CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow] = @CorrespondOfReplyWorkflowAND [CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow] IS NULL AND [CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow] LIKE @CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow_Like AND [MailTemplateId] = @MailTemplateIdAND [MailTemplateId] IS NULL AND [MailTemplateId] LIKE @MailTemplateId_Like AND [ReserveArea] = @ReserveAreaAND [ReserveArea] IS NULL AND [ReserveArea] LIKE @ReserveArea_Like
